title: Gradle task quarkusGenerateCode with custom Microprofile converter causes java.util.ServiceConfigurationError
body:
### Describe the bug

After trying to update to Quarkus 3.13.1 (from 3.12.x) we now get a `java.util.ServiceConfigurationError` on Gradle task `quarkusGenerateCode`. The task now expects the (first) class specified in `org.eclipse.microprofile.config.spi.Converter` to be on the classpath (but nothing has been built yet).

### Expected behavior

Task `quarkusGenerateCode` finishes as with previous Quarkus versions.
